sentences.english: Customers are our Gods of Wealth.
sentences.chinese: 顧客就是我們的財神爺。

sentences.english: Many Chinese restaurants and family enshrines Financial Secretary.
sentences.chinese: 許多中國飯店和家庭都供奉着財神爺。

sentences.english: I wish I were rich as Plutos.
sentences.chinese: 我希望像財神爺一樣有錢。

definition: ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
thriving and prosperous business or trade
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
poe divination, a traditional Chinese divination method where a pair of crescent-shaped wooden or bamboo blocks is thrown on the ground, with the positions of the blocks determining the divine answer
to extend New Year's greetings/to pay a New Year's visit
to put sth back where it belongs/to return to the original position/to return to one's seat (in a classroom)
to compete to be the first to answer a question (as on a quiz show)
